prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Pipe, Piano, Bass, Guitar, Synth Pad, Drums, Chromatic Percussion, but without Brass.
captions:
Style 1:
This piece of music features Pipe, Piano, Bass, Guitar, Synth Pad, Drums, Chromatic Percussion, but no Brass.

Style 2:
This song is composed of Pipe, Piano, Bass, Guitar, Synth Pad, Drums, Chromatic Percussion, excluding Brass.

Style 3:
This composition consists of Pipe, Piano, Bass, Guitar, Synth Pad, Drums, Chromatic Percussion, Brass not
